definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

pinyin: zong1 he2 ye4 wu4 shu4 zi4 wang3

sentences.english: Build a sub-process that you can use to manage larger business systems.
sentences.chinese: 构建可以用来管理较大业务系统的子流程。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司还经营化学产品和家产品进出口的业务。

sentences.english: Anna Hu joined in as Group Business Director and other hires.
sentences.chinese: 胡晓云加入担任业务群总监，还有一些新成员加盟。

sentences.english: Permissions will be controlled by a business manager or IT administrator.
sentences.chinese: 权限将由业务经理或IT管理员控制。

sentences.english: But sometimes, ISP's and mail service businesses have no interest in righting what went wrong.
sentences.chinese: 但有时，互联网的业务和邮件服务没有兴趣纠正想歪。

sentences.english: It is better to weed out the bad businesses within the group rather than cross-subsidise them to save face.
sentences.chinese: 将集团内的不良业务剔除，好过为了面子予以挽救。

sentences.english: This approach leads to misalignment between the business goals and the developed services.
sentences.chinese: 这个方法将导致业务目标和所开发的服务间的不一致。

sentences.english: He's a good lecturer as he really knows his stuff.
sentences.chinese: 他是位好讲师，因为他确实精通业务。

sentences.english: At this point, we have created standard interfaces and business objects.
sentences.chinese: 此时，我们已经创建了标准的接口和业务对象。

sentences.english: Radar data gridding and cinrad mosaic has significance in meteorological service.
sentences.chinese: 雷达资料的网格化及拼图在气象业务中有重要的意义。

sentences.english: He is always tell the director how to run the business; that's like teach his grandmother to suck egg.
sentences.chinese: 他老是对总裁说该如何管理业务，就跟班门弄斧似的。

sentences.english: Our company is an enterprise which is invested by Hong Kong investor only and manages businesses independently.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是港商独资企业，自主经营进出口业务。

sentences.english: In this section we will analyze the business case and problem in detail.
sentences.chinese: 在本部分中，我们将详细分析业务案例和问题。

sentences.english: We had been doing business with each other for years before we quarrelled.
sentences.chinese: 在吵翻之前，我们多年来在业务上一直来往。

sentences.english: This ensures that I have the right business entity.
sentences.chinese: 这就确保了我得到了正确的业务实体。

sentences.english: It's very easy, in the webhosting business , to stop listening to your clients.
sentences.chinese: 它很容易，在主机空间的业务，停止听您的客户。

definition: operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
